Flip the [Power Trend](https://johnmuchow.github.io/technical-analysis/posts/05-10-2020/Power-Trend.html) on its head and we end up with...a Power Outage ⚡️ 

Whereas a [Power Trend](https://www.tradingview.com/script/CzyVIdMM-Power-Trend-Pro-Spot-Powerful-Uptrends/) signals a powerful uptrend, a Power Outage highlights a strong downtrend. This concept was created with [David Ryan](https://twitter.com/dryan310), 3 time U.S Investing Champion 1985, 1986, 1987 and Portfolio Manager at William O'Neil & Co.
